snippet: PSA Peugeot Citroën says negotiations with Dongfeng Motor could lead to a capital increase.
abstract: Ailing French automaker PSA Peugeot Citroen, moving closer to securing a financial lifeline, says it is in negotiations with state-owned Chinese company Dongfeng Motor that could lead to an infusion of capital.
lead_paragraph: PSA Peugeot Citroën says negotiations with Dongfeng Motor could lead to a capital increase.

headline.main: Investment From China May Be Near for Peugeot
headline.print_headline: Investment From China May Be Near For Peugeot
